snippet: Influential midfielder Philippe Coutinho was making encouraging progress from an ankle injury but will not be rushed back to boost Liverpool's Premier League title aspirations, manager Juergen Klopp has said....

headline.main: Klopp Won't Rush Back Improving Coutinho
headline.print_headline: Klopp Won't Rush Back Improving Coutinho

lead_paragraph: Influential midfielder Philippe Coutinho was making encouraging progress from an ankle injury but will not be rushed back to boost Liverpool's Premier League title aspirations, manager Juergen Klopp has said.

snippet: Manchester City's recent history may be filled with domestic success, but manager Pep Guardiola said his side go into the Champions League knock-out phase as European novices....

headline.main: Man City Need to Earn Respect in Europe, Says Guardiola
headline.print_headline: Man City Need to Earn Respect in Europe, Says Guardiola

lead_paragraph: Manchester City's recent history may be filled with domestic success, but manager Pep Guardiola said his side go into the Champions League knock-out phase as European novices.

snippet: Jose Mourinho will always have a place in the hearts of Chelsea's faithful but his former charges are hoping to make him suffer when he returns to Stamford Bridge as manager of Manchester United on Sunday....

headline.main: Hot Costa Out to Spoil Mourinho's Chelsea Return
headline.print_headline: Hot Costa Out to Spoil Mourinho's Chelsea Return

lead_paragraph: Jose Mourinho will always have a place in the hearts of Chelsea's faithful but his former charges are hoping to make him suffer when he returns to Stamford Bridge as manager of Manchester United on Sunday.

snippet: Manchester United manager Louis van Gaal goes into the FA Cup final against Crystal Palace on Saturday facing echoes of the 1990 showpiece between the two sides that proved so pivotal in the career of Alex Ferguson....

headline.main: Shades of 1990 for Van Gaal as United Face Palace Again
headline.print_headline: Shades of 1990 for Van Gaal as United Face Palace Again

lead_paragraph: Manchester United manager Louis van Gaal goes into the FA Cup final against Crystal Palace on Saturday facing echoes of the 1990 showpiece between the two sides that proved so pivotal in the career of Alex Ferguson.

snippet: - English champions Leicester City failed to continue their mini-revival after a clinical finish by Bournemouth's Marc Pugh condemned them to a 1-0 away defeat in a scrappy Premier League clash on Tuesday....

headline.main: Lively Bournemouth Send Leicester Back Into Doldrums
headline.print_headline: Lively Bournemouth Send Leicester Back Into Doldrums

lead_paragraph: - English champions Leicester City failed to continue their mini-revival after a clinical finish by Bournemouth's Marc Pugh condemned them to a 1-0 away defeat in a scrappy Premier League clash on Tuesday.

snippet: Arsenal goalkeeper Petr Cech has made a surprise return to Chelsea's training ground ahead of Sunday's big London derby after Adidas sent a consignment of gloves to his former club by mistake....

headline.main: Cech Returns to Chelsea After Glove Mix-Up
headline.print_headline: Cech Returns to Chelsea After Glove Mix-Up

lead_paragraph: Arsenal goalkeeper Petr Cech has made a surprise return to Chelsea's training ground ahead of Sunday's big London derby after Adidas sent a consignment of gloves to his former club by mistake.

snippet: Nigel Pearson says he will call upon his experience in helping stabilise English Premier League champions Leicester City in his new role as manager of East Midlands neighbours Derby County....

headline.main: Pearson Will Use Leicester Experience to Develop Derby
headline.print_headline: Pearson Will Use Leicester Experience to Develop Derby

lead_paragraph: Nigel Pearson says he will call upon his experience in helping stabilise English Premier League champions Leicester City in his new role as manager of East Midlands neighbours Derby County.

snippet: Burnley manager Sean Dyche has called for retrospective bans to be introduced in order to stop players diving to win free kicks and penalties....

headline.main: Retrospective Bans Would Eradicate Diving, Says Dyche
headline.print_headline: Retrospective Bans Would Eradicate Diving, Says Dyche

lead_paragraph: Burnley manager Sean Dyche has called for retrospective bans to be introduced in order to stop players diving to win free kicks and penalties.

snippet: It seems Bob Bradley is being judged on more than just results during his first coaching stint in the English Premier League....

headline.main: Bradley Judged on His Words as Well as Results at Swansea
headline.print_headline: Bradley Judged on His Words as Well as Results at Swansea

lead_paragraph: It seems Bob Bradley is being judged on more than just results during his first coaching stint in the English Premier League.

snippet: Middlesbrough are back in the Premier League after a 1-1 draw with 10-man Brighton & Hove Albion in their multi-million pound  promotion decider on Saturday while Burnley sealed the Championship title with a 3-0 victory at Charlton Athletic....

headline.main: Boro in Top Flight After Draw, Burnley Win Championship
headline.print_headline: Boro in Top Flight After Draw, Burnley Win Championship

lead_paragraph: Middlesbrough are back in the Premier League after a 1-1 draw with 10-man Brighton & Hove Albion in their multi-million pound  promotion decider on Saturday while Burnley sealed the Championship title with a 3-0 victory at Charlton Athletic.
